name: Disco Vimpires
description:
Description:

This is a rhythm game with atypical mechanics.

Help the club security to cope with their work.

Gameplay:

  • You need to follow the gameplay in two windows, in turn.
  • On the first screen, you need to detect vampires and prevent them from entering the club. 
  • On the second screen, you need to pick up prohibited items from guests and launch them into the club after checking.

Control:

Left arrow - deny entry

Down arrow - pick up prohibited items

Right arrow - let the verified guest into the club

Creators

Code and sound: https://d0ctorandrey.itch.io/

Graphic arts: https://tonbliz.itch.io
